name: Treasure Trouble
description:
Treasure Trouble is an action arcade game about micromanaging a pirate ship. The gameplay consists on two players on a quest to return home after stealing the Kraken’s treasure who wants to steal it back. So go on, fix your ship ready your cannons and ready yourself to fight back, the Kraken’s onslaught is imminent. 

Will you survive and save your wealth? 

Will you get no gold and get home sad and poor? 

Or will you be the Kraken’s next meal?

Authors:

Javi de la Serna Martínez

Xavier Sanz

Eric Villalba Andrino

Pablo Martínez Pablo

Pablo Valero Morales

Carles Álvarez Labari
